languages.text: {n}Обезглавленное тело застыло на палубе. Срез шеи пялится на вас гротескно искаженной костью хребта. Мощь народного мифа истаивает в воздухе, как дымок, исходящий из дула его стаб-револьвера.{/n}

{n}The decapitated body lies motionless on the deck. The cut at the neck stares back at you from the grotesquely distorted ridge of its spine. The power of the folk myth fades into the air like the smoke billowing from the muzzle of his stub revolver.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Обезглавленное тело застыло на палубе. Срез шеи пялится на вас гротескно искаженной костью хребта. Мощь народного мифа истаивает в воздухе, как дымок, исходящий из дула его стаб-револьвера.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The decapitated body lies motionless on the deck. The cut of the neck stares back at you with the grotesquely distorted ridge of the spine. The power of the folk myth fades into the air like the smoke emanating from the muzzle of his stub revolver.{/n}

{n}The decapitated body lies motionless on the deck. The cut at the neck stares back at you from the grotesquely distorted ridge of its spine. The power of the folk myth fades into the air like the smoke billowing from the muzzle of his stub revolver.{/n}

{n}The decapitated body lies motionless on the deck. The cut at the neck stares back at you from the grotesquely distorted ridge of its spine. The power of the folk myth fades into the air like the smoke billowing from the muzzle of his stub revolver.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der enthauptete Leichnam liegt regungslos auf dem Deck. Der durchtrennte Hals samt der grotesk verdrehten Kante der Wirbelsäule scheint dich anzustarren. Die Macht des Volksmythos verpufft in der Luft wie der Rauch aus der Mündung seines Stummelrevolvers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The decapitated body lies motionless on the deck. The cut at the neck stares back at you from the grotesquely distorted ridge of its spine. The power of the folk myth fades into the air like the smoke billowing from the muzzle of his stub revolver.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der enthauptete Leichnam liegt regungslos auf dem Deck. Der durchtrennte Hals samt der grotesk verdrehten Kante der Wirbelsäule scheint dich anzustarren. Die Macht des Volksmythos verpufft in der Luft wie der Rauch aus der Mündung seines Stummelrevolvers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cuerpo decapitado yace inmóvil en el suelo. El corte del cuello te devuelve la mirada desde la grotesca forma de su columna. El poder del mito popular se desvanece en el aire junto con el humo que escapa del cañón de su revólver compacto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The decapitated body lies motionless on the deck. The cut at the neck stares back at you from the grotesquely distorted ridge of its spine. The power of the folk myth fades into the air like the smoke billowing from the muzzle of his stub revolver.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuerpo decapitado yace inmóvil en el suelo. El corte del cuello te devuelve la mirada desde la grotesca forma de su columna. El poder del mito popular se desvanece en el aire junto con el humo que escapa del cañón de su revólver compacto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}首を切断された死体は、デッキの上でピクリともしない。グロテスクに歪んだ背骨の曲がった頭部から、首の切り傷がじっとこちらを見つめている。語り継がれる伝説の力は、リボルバーの銃口から立ち上る煙のように、宙に消えていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The decapitated body lies motionless on the deck. The cut at the neck stares back at you from the grotesquely distorted ridge of its spine. The power of the folk myth fades into the air like the smoke billowing from the muzzle of his stub revolver.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}首を切断された死体は、デッキの上でピクリともしない。グロテスクに歪んだ背骨の曲がった頭部から、首の切り傷がじっとこちらを見つめている。語り継がれる伝説の力は、リボルバーの銃口から立ち上る煙のように、宙に消えていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}被砍断头颅的尸体躺在甲板上一动不动，畸形的脊柱上碗大的伤口仿佛在盯着你。传说的力量渐渐散佚在空气中，正如他的短筒左轮手枪枪口冒出的滚滚浓烟渐渐消逝一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The decapitated body lies motionless on the deck. The cut at the neck stares back at you from the grotesquely distorted ridge of its spine. The power of the folk myth fades into the air like the smoke billowing from the muzzle of his stub revolver.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}被砍断头颅的尸体躺在甲板上一动不动，畸形的脊柱上碗大的伤口仿佛在盯着你。传说的力量渐渐散佚在空气中，正如他的短筒左轮手枪枪口冒出的滚滚浓烟渐渐消逝一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le corps décapité gît immobile sur le pont. Le cou tranché vous regarde fixement depuis l'arête grotesquement déformée de sa colonne vertébrale. Le pouvoir de la légende populaire se dissipe dans l'air comme la fumée qui s'échappe de la bouche de son revolver.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The decapitated body lies motionless on the deck. The cut at the neck stares back at you from the grotesquely distorted ridge of its spine. The power of the folk myth fades into the air like the smoke billowing from the muzzle of his stub revolver.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le corps décapité gît immobile sur le pont. Le cou tranché vous regarde fixement depuis l'arête grotesquement déformée de sa colonne vertébrale. Le pouvoir de la légende populaire se dissipe dans l'air comme la fumée qui s'échappe de la bouche de son revolver.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kafası kesilen ceset, güvertede hareketsizce uzanıyor. Boynundaki kesik, omurgasının tuhaf bir şekilde bozulmuş çıkıntısından sana bakıyor. Halk masalının gücü, bodur altıpatlarının ağzından dalga dalga yayılan duman misali havaya karışıp yok oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The decapitated body lies motionless on the deck. The cut at the neck stares back at you from the grotesquely distorted ridge of its spine. The power of the folk myth fades into the air like the smoke billowing from the muzzle of his stub revolver.{/n}
